title: Quarkus Newsletter #22 - July
content: The July newsletter is out with some great new Quarkus related technical articles. Learn about "Kafka Streams and Quarkus: Real-Time Processing Events" by Alex Soto and Michael Redlich. Get a better understanding of resilience deisgn patters in the "Resilient microservices with Quarkus and Kotlin - Design Patterns" article by Felicia...
